page.title: 07SHOPS IN CARTMEL - 4
page.content:
{TRADE SHOPS (4) {NOW AND THEN - A COMPARISON OF SITES {IN 1916 AND IN 1985. Miss Smith is one of Cartmel's oldest inhabitants. During an interview with her, she gave me the following information on shops in Carmel. {IN 1916 IN 1985 Miss Wilson's Priory Shop Green grocers Spar shop Bakers Bridge Stores Drapers shop Hairdress Post Office/Pottery Post Office Butcher Peter Bain Smith Cafe Shoe shop Hatmaker The Larch Tree Sadler Tarragon Bootmaker Cavendish Pork butcher Jewellers
{Reported by Derrick Paul Stiff, aged {10 }
